answers.answer: I've never heard of that. I took it and it never stressed me out. Pregnancy causes a lot of over thinking when it comes to any test. People usually want to know so the doctor gives them an option to abort which is so ridiculous but just be positive and don't sweat it I'm sure your baby is healthy and normal like I said you'll stress over everything in pregnancy from the baby having disabilities to the diabetes test even that random weird cramp you get out of no where

I had the quad screening done with all mine the first one came back positive for spina bifida and it scared me and the drs scared me and I was stressed but in the end my baby was fine and had no problems. But I'd rather know if something was wrong so I could prepare my self for what's to come.

I had the blood testing done for all of that. Mine came back with.My son having trisomy 18 just like DS just the baby doesn't live like DS babies do.. anyway yes, I had the blood done and.came back.with positive I later got an amino to be 100% and turns out the blood test was a false positive ! Don't trust it.

question: I heard it has a high false positive rate.. Did you take it and regret it because of the extra stress it added or are you thankful? My appointment is tomorrow and I'm not sure what to do!
title: Test that looks for Down syndrome?
